item.description:
Get in the Halloween spirit and join us as we check out the famous SpookyWorld!

SpookyWorld & Nightmare New England join forces at one location to bring you the most terrifying haunted house & Halloween attraction in New England. SpookyWorld has an incredible midway full of games and events. The park also features amazing and horrifying walk through attractions which are guaranteed to give everyone a thrill they will never forget! They have 7 haunted attractions!

The 'Spooky World' dwells at Mels Funway Park in Litchfield, N.H. In addition to the scariest Haunts in New England you will experience during your visit, SpookyWorld has concessions and food, from ice cream and pizza, to fried dough and seafood; featuring the original fried clam! The Park is a destination location for all.

You can buy tickets online and save time! We will be getting general admission tickets which are $29.99. We will meet at 6pm and get some food before checking out the attractions. Please meet us near the ticket area. Please call my cell, 774 232 0000, if you have trouble finding us.

SpookyWorld is located 45 minutes north of Boston in Litchfield, New Hampshire at Mel's Funway Park, LLC. The official address is: 454 Charles Bancroft Highway (Rt 3A) Litchfield, NH 03052.

If you would like to carpool, please indicate in your RSVP. Members can arrange their own carpooling. Each member is responsible for their own ticket purchase.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near ticket area. If need to, call 774 232 0000
item.name: SpookyWorld and Nightmare New England Haunted Houses and Attractions
